text: Therefore , our data not only reveal that <extra_id_0> Nmi <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> can potentiate STAT - dependent transcription , but also suggest that it can augment coactivator protein recruitment to at least some members of a group of sequence - specific transcription factors .
